# sakura_apigw_group (Data Source)

Get information about an existing API Gateway Group.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "sakura_apigw_group" "foobar" {
  name = "foobar"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the API Gateway Group.
- `name` (String) The name of the API Gateway Group.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp
- `tags` (Set of String) The tags of the API Gateway Group.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp
